sentences.en: Blodgett College is on the edge of Minneapolis it is a bulwark of sound religion.
sentences.cn: 布格杰特学院座落在明尼阿波利斯的近郊,它是正统宗教的堡垒.

sentences.en: Bulwark plates in way of mooring fittings to be increased and reinforced.
sentences.cn: 舷墙外板在系泊设备处需要加强和加固.

sentences.en: Bulwark stays shall be provided at two frame spacing intervals.
sentences.cn: 每两个肋骨间距设舷墙肘板.

sentences.en: It was a comfort in her distress and a bulwark against her increasing disillusionment.
sentences.cn: 这是她苦恼中的一种安慰,是对她有增无已的幻灭的一种防御.

sentences.en: Platform can be accessed from both side of wing bulwark.
sentences.cn: 平台可以从驾驶室两翼舷墙进入.

sentences.en: Spruance lounged outside, elbows on the bulwark.
sentences.cn: 斯普鲁恩斯在外边闲望, 胳膊肘搁在舷樯上.

sentences.en: The abbeys were founded in the 12th century by King David as a bulwark against the English.
sentences.cn: 这些修道院是12世纪大卫王用来抵御英国人而修建的堡垒。

sentences.en: The dam will be a bulwark against floods.
sentences.cn: 这防波堤可以堤防洪水.

sentences.en: The height of bulwark shall be 1000 mm or as per rules.
sentences.cn: 舷墙的高度为1000mm或者是根据规范.

sentences.en: The institution that sees itself as the bulwark against worsening chaos has always been the army.
sentences.cn: 视自己为应对进一步恶化的混乱局面的堡垒的那一机构一直都是军队.

sentences.en: The navy is our principal bulwark against invasion.
sentences.cn: 海军是我们抵御侵略者的重要保障.

sentences.en: The new dam was a bulwark against future floods.
sentences.cn: 新水坝是将来抵御洪水的屏障.

sentences.en: The soldiers kept their heads down behind the bulwark.
sentences.cn: 这些士兵在壁垒之后低着头.

sentences.en: The US must offer to assist this healing process and bolster democracy in Pakistan as the best bulwark against terrorists.
sentences.cn: 美国必须辅助这个恢复进程，鼓励巴基斯坦的民主，以此作为对抗恐怖主义的最佳防波堤。

sentences.en: TYPICAL USE : The soldiers kept their heads down behind the bulwark.
sentences.cn: 士兵们保持头低低地在堡垒的后面.

trans.tran_en: a strong structure like a wall, built for defence
